website_summaries.verdict: They cost a little more, but these high-quality pads will block odors and absorb moisture effectively.
pros: Contains safe materials, so the skin on your hands won't break out
Should work for an entire sports season of several months
Edges of pads have hook-and-loop tape, so you can attach multiple pads together for stubborn odors
cons: Square shapes of these pads may not fit all styles of gloves fully

customer_reviews.title: Smell is way, way, way too strong!
customer_reviews.text: Two issues: (1) the smell is so strong that it is absolutely overwhelming. I bought the pods for my boxing gloves and had to take them out of the gloves and put them in a plastic bag after about 30 minutes. Smelled up the entire room and 24 hours later I could still smell it. (2) as noted by another reviewer, the writing on the pods is not permanent and quickly and easily rubs off and gets on everything. I can tell you that my gloves don't smell like sweat anymore but the replacement smell is just as obnoxious. I don't know if the water absorption part works because I didn't use them long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of printing on product!
customer_reviews.text: They have a nice clean smell to them out of the box, I do think they helped dry some of my hockey gear so far. Only complaint is that the company logo is like screen printed onto them and somehow the printing is not completely dry, what ever the “ink” is made out of is still like “tacky” to touch and has gotten on everything it has touched (mostly black equipment with the silver/ grey ink). So now I have the logo smeared and imprinted on my equipment bag, my gloves, my helmet, etc. So if they could fix whatever is causing that I would update to a five star review.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great freshener!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this product. I have them hidden in spots in my house and you continually get a whiff of it's lovely fragrance. I also have one in my car. Even though it's a sports deodorizer, it can be used in so many other ways, and it lasts for ever!!
customer_reviews.author: CocoChugs

customer_reviews.title: Works well for climbing shoes but very strong fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for months and they work wonders for my leather climbing shoes which generally stay in my gym bag. Cuts down on the odor tremendously. I will say the fragrance is rather strong (has kind of a fresh laundry smell) and takes some getting used to, but it's much better than having stinky shoes. If I leave my gym bag in the car the fragrance is noticeable when I get in, so maybe if you're super sensitive to smells this could give you a headache, but for me they're great and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smoke

customer_reviews.title: No more skate stench!
customer_reviews.text: My son's hockey bag stank so bad! I tried the deodorizer balls but the smell was overpowering and awful. No matter how much I left it open it still would stink! I got a set of the GearHalo to put in his skates and his bag no longer smells like cat pee or hockey stench! Highly recommended these to other hockey parents on his team and they all love them too. They would probably work great for other sports equipment too.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Garner

customer_reviews.title: Too strong
customer_reviews.text: These smell VERY strong. Anything they come into contact with will smell like chemicals for weeks; even after washing. I threw them away. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: M-dub

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to buy this amazing product. It’s the best!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product ever! My son’s hockey bag.... STINKS! I mean awful. This little bag of miracle saved the day. Usually we all gag when he opens up his bag. (I think someone actually tossed their cookies!) but not anymore. His bag smells delightful.... honestly. I can’t believe how well it works. I just bought more to throw one in the bottom of his laundry basket (sock stink) and one in my trunk. I bought another set to stick in my daughter’s hockey bag (not that she stinks like my son.... but hey, might as well make her bag smell delightful too!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING!!! The only product we’ve ever had that ACTUALLY WORKS to rid the stench of our kids’ stinky hockey bags & lacrosse bags. The pods can be put in the dryer to recharge them. They smell wonderful and it works! It’s a strong yet, pleasant scent. We are very pleased with these and happily put two pods in every bag. The pods can also be placed inside of shoes, gloves, skates etc., to absorb awful odors. These would also work great to place in bathrooms, inside cars or anywhere you’d like to absorb nasty odors. We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hockey Mom

customer_reviews.title: Killed the stink!
customer_reviews.text: I had some barefoot gym shoes that were reeking and these knocked the stink out of them. I wish they helped more with drying them out but they've met my needs and keep my gym bag smelling better. They do have a strong chemical smell but it's not unpleasant. It's so much better than gym stink!
customer_reviews.author: Elanor Oranges

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The smell is nice. I put them in my teens hockey gloves and it has helped.
customer_reviews.author: cheerlaxmom

customer_reviews.title: Chemicals hurt my eyes, stunk up room, had to throw it out, put my shoes outside to get rid of smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because of good reviews. Within an hour my eyes were hurting from the chemical (they still are 8 hours later in spite of rinsing with water several times) and the smell in my room was unbearable. After just ten minutes I had to put my shoes out on the porch to try to let the air take away the smell. I can't believe anyone tolerates this smell. I think this is the first review I've been moved to write on Amazon after many years as a regular customer. I felt I had to warn people. (Possibly I wrote one or two reviews many years ago; for sure this is the first one in several years.)
customer_reviews.author: a time to read, a time to listen

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I have two teen boys, both play lax, can't wash cleats and gloves don't do well with excessive washings. These drop right in the cleats, so simple, they are actually used. Best part, the gear bag no longer smells - ever - and when they change out of cleats in the car, no stinky feet/sock smells. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: time restricted

customer_reviews.title: These little bags are on a mission to destroy the stink!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally something that works by getting to the root of what causes the stink, moisture. The fresh sent also helps speed up the odor elimination. These little bags are gold!! Don't waste your time with those sprays that make your equipment smell like a mixture of bubblegum and vomit!
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 hockey players... 14 and 13.. and the smell... Omg! This was recommended by our x coach/ friend.. wow! Fantastic! Now I was told it lasts 2 months.. even if only 1 .. still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Elmnt5

customer_reviews.title: Horrible--  smell made me  gag and stop breathing
customer_reviews.text: purchased based on recommendation from "best shoe odor eliminator 2020" article. was looking for something non toxic.. the smell out of the box was so overpowering and awful I had to run outside with them and try to get them out of the house & far away from me. bad chemical toxicity reaction in my throat and lungs : ( far worse than the sneaker balls which are bad enough sending back !!
customer_reviews.author: The peripatetic critic

customer_reviews.title: Shoes smell like cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I used these pouches for my boots, now my boots reek of cleaning product. The smell is very overwhelming, I can't wear my boots at all because of the smell and it gives me headaches.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.text: These are great! No matter how smelly your gym bag/shoes are these will take stink away.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Used these pods in my kids hockey bags. The scent was strong at first, but it permeated the entire bag. Everything smells fresh even the stinky helmets. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Dara Talton

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a softball catcher. We live in central Florida. With tournaments consisting of 4 to 6 games per weekend her gear can get pretty stinky. Last weekend she caught 4 games and on Monday evening had a private lesson with her softball coach. The coach ask as soon as she opened her gear bag what smells so fresh and clean. We had to admit it was the Gearhalo. It just works.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Ideal to help mask/clear the sports funk
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 sets of these (one for my son and one for my husband), we place them in the gloves after hockey and at times I have placed in the skates as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Effective and odor eliminating!
customer_reviews.text: The scent of these deodorizer pods is wonderful! They are easy to throw into a football, baseball? Or hockey bag! They are well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and they work!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is really strong, but pleasant. I put them in my shoes overnight after they were soaked through with rain. In the morning, they were dry and did not smell. Hopefully these will last a while. If so, I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Product really works!
customer_reviews.text: This product really works on eliminating odors from sneakers. Wow! Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Davemitchell

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely smells good. We haven’t had it long enough to know the longevity or ability to reduce moisture. I will say, I the packaging was super disappointing. I ordered 2 to give one and a gift and the box arrived just smashed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bye smell
customer_reviews.text: Drop them in the skates after practice or a game and reduce that hockey bag order. A must.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Massel

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the stink!
customer_reviews.text: My son put them in his stinky hockey skates. I have to say they made the hockey bag smell much better than before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best!! They pull the wet and the smell from hockey gloves and skates!!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and has taken the smell out of my hockey gloves
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gragnano

customer_reviews.title: Huge Improvement
customer_reviews.text: We are using these in my son's soccer goalkeeper gloves. What a difference they are making. The gloves smelled so bad, we couldn't bring them into the house. Now he puts these inside the pair he wears after each practice and they help to dry the gloves for the next wear. The smell is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Turner

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised - stink is gone! Strong smell, but fades within a few hours.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these smell like cat litter, and the scent is strong. But after removing them, I don’t notice the smell after a few hours. And believe me, they KILL the shoe funk so I can deal with the floral smell for a little while. If you have smelly shoes, do everyone a favor and BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Must have for hockey bag!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is in these but my son’s hockey bag and gear, including gloves, no longer smell like a rotting dead animal. I used both pouches because his bag is so big and smelled so bad, but one should be strong enough for a smaller bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no more stink
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed and worked great. My feet get very sweaty and smelly after being on my feet all day at work and these did an amazing job on my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: StykeEagle1776

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but work really well. We use them for hockey gear.
customer_reviews.author: ThomasT

customer_reviews.title: These work!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son plays hockey and his bag could kill you, if you were to get a whiff....these things work! Don't hesitate to buy them. I even bought more for my daughters soccer bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for neutralizing smells
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for neutralizing odors. We have two in our cat litter room and they zap the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my shoes from smelling
customer_reviews.text: Kept my running shoes from getting too smelly without much of an oppressive odor.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Badders

customer_reviews.title: De-stink Hockey Gear
customer_reviews.text: These little deodorizer pods kept the stink way, way down in my daughter’s hockey gear bag and skates. Yea!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lukasik

customer_reviews.title: Making hockey stink less
customer_reviews.text: If hockey items are part of your life, then these are a must have. Smells nice and helps keep glove palms dry and less smelly. I also threw some in my car to reduce bag odor.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: These fresheners are AMAZING!! They completely take the hockey stink out of hockey bags.
customer_reviews.author: hockeymomof3

customer_reviews.title: An integral part of your hockey bag
customer_reviews.text: One of the only items that REALLY work to eliminate the hockey odor!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S. Drebing

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These seem to help a lot with the glove stink, however the scent is a little over powering. Overall though, we like these and will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Helps with hockey smell
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Really helped my boys hockey bags.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki v

customer_reviews.title: Best Deodorizer out there!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best hockey deodorizer hands down. Never had anything work so well!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry McCornick

customer_reviews.title: Works...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised, pretty impressive how such a small bag packs big power.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff! My kid’s sports bag smells like fresh laundry along with their shoes!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kitzmiller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! My daughter’s volleyball shoes (and entire backpack) smell amazing 8 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Renee R.

customer_reviews.title: Scent will knock your socks off!
customer_reviews.text: The scent was beyond overpowering. While it did eliminate shoe odor, the solution was worse than the problem. I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Doc86

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: This just leaves gear smelling like cat litter instead of sweat. Not sure which is worse.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Cason

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product worth the money. My work boots smell so good
customer_reviews.author: Ronald V. Gómez

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of soccer stink!
customer_reviews.text: Use these for soccer cleats and goalkeeper gloves - works like a charm. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: kristine a seitz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the stank out
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my snowboard boots. After a day on the slopes my boots definitely needed something. These keep that stank out and I don't worry about it spreading throughout my car on the way home. I highly recommend getting these. GAME CHANGER.
customer_reviews.author: Kermie

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Hockey Bag stench!
customer_reviews.text: These things work to help eliminate the nasty hockey back stench! I can not stand the smell and was at wits end trying to find something to help. I will add that the only negative is the smell is very strong (not a bad smell but just powerful) so sometimes it can be a bit overwhelming. it has a clean smell (not flowery or baby powder smell) I will definitely be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Foss

customer_reviews.title: the stink is gone.
customer_reviews.text: the stink is gone. never had a more fresh smelling hockey bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: takes away all the stink from my sons football bag
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: GEARHALO Sports Deodorizer Pods - Stops The Stink!
product_meta.description:
POWERFUL AND EFFECTIVE 

 Gearhalo pods are a dry solution that combat the root causes of Sport Stink in all your gear. Non -toxic and used by the pros.

 DESIGNED TO WORK 

SilverACTIV to combat odor , a re-chargable moisture removal system to dry your gear, and a fresh scent deodorizer to make your gear smell great. A patent pending made in North America solution. Each cube contains 2 pods. How to use: Use GearHalo in all your gear to prevent odor problems.

 ODORS CAN’T HIDE FROM GEARHALO

 Place pods inside each piece of equipment after use. GearHalo should be placed directly in the problem area; in skates, shoes, and boots, pods should be stuffed into the toe area where odors hide. Use the Velcro to connect pods for use in larger sizes or pieces of gear. GearHalo is heat activated so place inside gear immediately after activity.

 LONG LASTING

 GearHalo is designed to last an entire season. 

MULTI-PURPOSE: FOR MORE THAN JUST SPORTS

 More than just sports: Uses for your GearHalo pods are not limited to sports gear. Their moisture removal and deodorizer properties are also very useful in the following applications: 

-Automobiles

 -Gym Lockers 

-Luggage 

-Work Gloves 

-Climbing shoes 

-Golf shoes 

-Work boots 

-Dance Shoes 

-Camping 

-Travel 

-Military and Tactical Gear
feature_bullets: PREVENTS SPORT-STINK - No Charcoal here! Uses SilverActiv protection to stop sport-stink. The fresh scent will leave your gear smelling clean, fresh and ready for next time. Non-toxic and used by the pros.
DRY YOUR GEAR - The pods remove moisture to keep your gear dry and fresh.
MODULAR - Attach one or more pods together for larger gear,or tough jobs.
RECHARGEABLE - The fresh scent will last an entire season and the moisture wicking properties are rechargeable.
BUILT FOR HOCKEY AND LACROSSE- and shoes, work boots, gloves, bags, helmets, pads - whatever your sport, our pods will keep it fresh.
